entry.title: Draft BIP: OP_TXHASH and OP_CHECKTXHASHVERIFY
entry.summary: The email contains information about an updated draft BIP (Bitcoin Improvement Proposal) that includes a proposed reference implementation and a link to an implementation of a caching strategy. The purpose of the update is to demonstrate that it is possible to achieve TXHASH (transaction hash) in a way that limits the number of bytes hashes after each large transaction element (such as scripts and annexes) has been hashed exactly once. The email provides a link to the draft BIP and another link to the cache implementation on GitHub. The email was sent by Steven Roose via the bitcoin dev mailing list on September 30, 2023 at 12:44.
